headline: Is It Too Late To Consider Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies (WAB) After Strong Multi Year Rally
summary: If you are trying to figure out whether Westinghouse Air Brake Technologies is priced attractively right now, the starting point is to understand what the current market price is actually implying about the business. The stock last closed at US$262.93, with share price returns of 2.7% over 7 days, 14.3% over 30 days, 21.6% year to date, 45.2% over 1 year, 156.4% over 3 years and 261.2% over 5 years. These figures naturally raise questions about how expectations and risk are being reflected...
